article: I'm Mike. I am from England. I study  _  China now. My parents live in China, too. My mother and I want  to go  on a trip to the Great wall. The Great wall is very nice. We can  see  many things there. It is about 400 kilometers  _  my home in China to Beijing. We can go to Beijing by bus, by train or by plane. Taking a plane is the  most expensive  way. Buses are slow. We want to go there by  _  , because a train is cheap and fast. We are leaving  _  7:00 pm tomorrow. And we will  arrive  there on Saturday morning. We will have a trip there for two  _  . We will go back on Monday .When I come back, I will  show  some pictures to my friends.
